commands.name: az mobile-network pccp collect-diagnostics-package
commands.summary: Collect a diagnostics package for the specified packet core control plane. This action will upload the diagnostics to a storage account.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pccp collect-diagnostics-package --blob-url
                                                   [--ids]
                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                   [--pccp-name]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--subscription]
examples: az mobile-network pccp collect-diagnostics-package --pccp-name pccp -g rg --blob-url https://contosoaccount.blob.core.windows.net/container/diagnosticsPackage.zip

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp create
commands.summary: Create a packet core control plane.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pccp create --access-interface
                              --local-diagnostics
                              --name
                              --platform
                              --resource-group
                              --sites
                              --sku {G0, G1, G10, G2, G5}
                              [--core-network-tec {5GC, EPC, EPC + 5GC}]
                              [--identity]
                              [--location]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--tags]
                              [--ue-mtu]
                              [--version]
examples: az mobile-network pccp create -n pccp-name -g rg --access-interface "{name:N2,ipv4Address:10.28.128.2,ipv4Subnet:10.28.128.0/24,ipv4Gateway:10.28.128.1}" --local-diagnostics "{authentication-type:AAD}" --platform "{type:AKS-HCI}" --sites "[{id:site-id}]" --sku G0

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified packet core control plane.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pccp delete [--ids]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--yes]
examples: az mobile-network pccp delete -n pccp-name -g rg -y

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp list
commands.summary: List all the packet core control planes in a subscription.

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp reinstall
commands.summary: Reinstall the specified packet core control plane. This action will remove any transaction state from the packet core to return it to a known state. This action will cause a service outage.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pccp reinstall [--ids]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--pccp-name]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--subscription]
examples: az mobile-network pccp reinstall --pccp-name pccp-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp rollback
commands.summary: Roll back the specified packet core control plane to the previous version, "rollbackVersion". Multiple consecutive rollbacks are not possible. This action may cause a service outage.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pccp rollback [--ids]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--pccp-name]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--subscription]
examples: az mobile-network pccp rollback --pccp-name pccp-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp show
commands.summary: Get information about the specified packet core control plane.
examples: az mobile-network pccp show -n pccp-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp update
commands.summary: Update a packet core control plane.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pccp update [--access-interface]
                              [--add]
                              [--core-network-tec {5GC, EPC, EPC + 5GC}]
                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--identity]
                              [--ids]
                              [--local-diagnostics]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--platform]
                              [--remove]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--set]
                              [--sites]
                              [--sku {G0, G1, G10, G2, G5}]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--tags]
                              [--ue-mtu]
                              [--version]
examples: az mobile-network pccp update -n pccp-name -g rg --ue-mtu 1500 --tags "{tag:test,tag2:test2}"

commands.name: az mobile-network pccp wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
